brmsINLApower 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Two-Stage Bayesian Assurance Simulation

    brms_inla_power_two_stage.Rd

    Runs a two-stage assurance / power simulation using brms_inla_power. Stage 1 does a coarse grid search over effect_range and n_range. Stage 2 refines the search near the target assurance band.

    brms_inla_power_two_stage(
  formula,
  effect_name,
  effect_range,
  n_range,
  stage1_k_effects = 7,
  stage1_k_n = 8,
  stage1_nsims = 100,
  stage2_nsims = 400,
  refine_metric = c("direction", "threshold", "rope"),
  refine_target = 0.8,
  prob_threshold = 0.95,
  effect_threshold = 0,
  obs_per_group = NULL,
  error_sd = NULL,
  group_sd = 0.5,
  band = 0.06,
  expand = 1L,
  ...
)

    Arguments

    formula

    Model formula.

    effect_name

    Name of fixed effect to assess.

    effect_range

    Numeric length-2 vector for effect size range.

    n_range

    Numeric length-2 vector for sample size range.

    stage1_k_effects

    Effects in Stage 1 grid (default 7).

    stage1_k_n

    Sample sizes in Stage 1 grid (default 8).

    stage1_nsims

    Sims per cell in Stage 1 (default 100).

    stage2_nsims

    Sims per cell in Stage 2 (default 400).

    refine_metric

    Metric to refine on: "direction", "threshold", or "rope".

    refine_target

    Target assurance value to refine around (default 0.8).

    prob_threshold

    Posterior prob. threshold for decisions.

    effect_threshold

    Effect size threshold for "threshold" rules.

    obs_per_group

    Observations per group for generator.

    error_sd

    Residual SD for Gaussian-like families.

    group_sd

    SD for random effects in generator.

    band

    Bandwidth around target for candidate cells (default 0.06).

    expand

    Expand radius in grid steps (default 1).

    ...

    Additional arguments passed to brms_inla_power.

    Value

    List with elements:

    results

    Combined Stage 1 and Stage 2 simulation results.

    summary

    Aggregated metrics per cell.

    stage1

    Stage 1 grid info.

    stage2

    Stage 2 grid info.

    params

    Refinement parameters.

    Contents

    Developed by Tony Myers.
